ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Excellent survey course of the Golden Age of Islam. Touched upon all the important intellectual, religious and political trends of the period. A delight to take part in Professor Bowering's intellect and knowledge.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Helped me get a better understanding of the roots and history of the current Middle East, which was extremely valuable in helping me better understand the current situation in the region
